mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (user_id, title, content, views) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id as postId, p.user_id as userId, p.title, p.content, p.views, p.created_at as createdAt, p.updated_at as updatedAt, u.username FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}

SELECT p.post_id as postId, p.user_id as userId, p.title, p.content, p.views, p.created_at as createdAt, p.updated_at as updatedAt, u.username FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT p.post_id as postId, p.user_id as userId, p.title, p.content, p.views, p.created_at as createdAt, p.updated_at as updatedAt, u.username FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE post_id = #{postId}
